pages.text:
Events
Events
sprengerstg
2025-05-01T02:49:02+00:00
Our private, Bavarian-influenced venue offers the perfect locale for your next high-end gathering. The Sprengergarten family proudly offers customizable spaces, lavish modern amenities, and high-tech opulence replete with natural splendor and grandeur. There are no limits to the dazzling photo opportunities amongst our 18 acres of venue space!
Where the Future Event of Your Dreams Can Come To Fruition
The Sprengergarten Family is dedicated to creating the event of your dreams. The state-of-the-art technology capabilities allow for seamless presentations and audio-visual experiences. Our ultra-flexible decor options ensure that your event is personalized to your specific preferences and needs, leaving no stone unturned in creating the perfect atmosphere for your luxury family affair, be it a corporate event, party, wedding, rehearsal, shower, holiday, celebration, or themed fest.
Events and Weddings
At Sprengergarten, we specialize in hosting unforgettable events and weddings of all sizes. With multiple stunning venue locations to choose from, we offer the perfect setting for everything from intimate gatherings to grand celebrations. Our customizable packages are designed to meet every budget, ensuring your special day is both memorable and stress-free. Whether you’re planning a wedding, corporate event, or private party, our dedicated team is here to bring your vision to life.
Sprengergarten: Mindfully Made With Accessibility for All in Mind
While attending a wedding or event at Sprengergarten, our utmost priority is ensuring your ease and comfort. We are excited to provide accessible accommodations for our esteemed guests. Our private parking area has conveniently accessible parking spaces, and we have made sure that doorways are wider and steps have been eliminated for easy accessibility. In addition, all of our buildings have first-floor restrooms available.
Ready to Book a Tour?
Come see the pristine grounds and multiple versatile venue locations at Sprengergarten by scheduling a tour of our grounds. Our family can’t wait to meet you in person and discuss making your next special occasion one to remember forever!
Check Availability
